Originally the FC Barcelona begun to play futsal in 1978 till 1982 when it was disbanded. Later, in 1986, the club was re-founded and now uses to play the local matches in the [[Palau Blaugrana]] with capacity of 8,500 seaters. == Season to season== {| |valign="top" width=0%| {| class="wikitable" |- style="background:#f0f6fa;" !'''Season''' !'''Division''' !'''Place''' !'''[[Copa de EspaÃ±a de Futsal|Copa de EspaÃ±a]]''' |- |style="background:#90EE90;"|[[1989â90 DivisiÃ³n de Honor de Futsal|1989/90]] |style="background:#90EE90;"|[[Primera DivisiÃ³n de Futsal|D.
